column2: "Asɛm a EWURADZE nam nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia do kaa tsiaa Babilɔn wɔ Kaldeafo asaase ho no."
"Hom mpaa mu nka wɔ amanaman mu na hom mfa ntahye
column3: na hom nsi frankaa; hom mfa ntahye
column4: na mma hom nnsiw do: hom nse dɛ
column7: Merodak no bo etu; woegu n'ehonyi enyim ase

column2: "Na ɔman bi fii kwaamu afamu rutu no do ɔsa a wɔbɛma n'asaase ayɛ amamfo
column3: na obiara renntsena do: woeguanguan
column4: wɔkɔ

column2: "Nda no mu na aber no mu
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse
column4: Israelmba bɛba
column5: hɔn na Judamba nyina; wɔdze osu botu hɔn kwan wɔakɔhwehwɛ EWURADZE hɔn Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Wɔbɛdan hɔn enyim akyerɛ Zion do
column3: woebisa ekyir kwan
column4: dɛ
column5: Hom mbra mfa homho mbɔbɔ EWURADZE ho
column6: wɔ daa ahyɛmudzi a werɛ rimmfir no mu."

column2: "Me man ayɛ nguan a wɔayew: hɔn nguanhwɛfo ama wɔatotɔ gon
column3: na wɔama wɔafomfom kwan wɔ mbepɔw no do: woefi bepɔw do kɔ koko do
column4: hɔn werɛ efir hɔn ahomgyebea."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔtoo hɔn nyina amemen hɔn: na hɔn atamfo see dɛ
column3: Yɛmmfom
column4: osiandɛ wɔayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE

column2: "Hom nguan mfi Babilɔn finimfin
column3: na hom mfir edzi mfi Kaldeafo asaase do nkɔ
column4: na hom nyɛ dɛ mpɔnkyenyin a wodzi nguankuw enyim."

column2: "Na
column3: hwɛ
column4: mibekenyan amanaman akɛse mboanofo ma wofi kwaamu afamu asaase do aba Babilɔn do; na wobotwa no ho mpasuar; na nkyii wɔbɛfa kurow no: hɔn egyen menaba tse dɛ ɔbarimba katakyi nedze; no mu biara nnsan ekyir kwa."

column2: "Na Kaldea bɛyɛ afonam: hɔn a wɔfa no afo nyinara bɛmee
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Hom a hom foom m'egyapadze fae
column3: kaansa hom enyi agye
column4: na hom ridzi ehurusi
column5: kaansa hom adodɔ seradze dɛ nantwifɔr a ɔroporow eburow
column6: na hom su dɛ mpɔnkɔ abran mpo a;"

column2: "hom na n'enyi bɔto papaara; nyia ɔwoo hom no n'enyim bogu ase. Hwɛ
column3: ɔbɛyɛ amanaman mu ekyirkafo
column4: sar

column2: "Osian EWURADZE n'ebufuw ntsi wɔrenntsena do
column3: na ɔbɛyɛ amamfo koraa: obiara a otwa mu wɔ Babilɔn no no ho bɔbow no
column4: na ɔabɔ nhwiroma wɔ n'amandzehu nyinara ntsi."

column2: "Hom a hom kontom egyen nyinara
column3: hom mbaa mpasuar ntwa nhyia Babilɔn ho; hom ntotow mbobɔ no
column4: mma hom nnkam hom egyen menaba do: na ɔayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE."

column2: "Hom mbɔ ose ngu no do ntwa nhyia; ɔdze noho ama; n'aban ahwehwe ase
column3: n'afasu edwuruw; na EWURADZE n'awerdzi nye no; hom ndzi no wer; dɛ mbrɛ ɔayɛ no
column4: hom so nyɛ no bi."

column2: "Hom ntwa duafo no mfi Babilɔn
column3: na nyia osuo kantankrankye no mu wɔ twaber mu no: ahyɛdo afona no ho suro ntsi
column4: hɔn mu biara bɛdan noho akɔ no nkorɔfo hɔ
column5: na hɔn mu obiara eguan akɔ nankasa n'asaase do."

column2: "Israel yɛ nguantsen a wɔabɔ apetse; ngyata no apam no kɔ; asɔpɔn no Asiriahen bɛtsetseew no mu; na ekyirii Babilɔnhen Nebukadenezar yi bobubuu ne mbiew mu."
"Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi: Hwɛ
column3: mebɛtsea Babilɔnhen na n'asaase
column4: dɛ mbrɛ matsea Asiriahen yi."

column2: "Na medze Israel bɛsan aba n'edzidzibea
column3: na oedzidzi wɔ Karmel na Basan
column4: na ne kra amee wɔ Efraim akoko do na Gilead."

column2: "Nda no mu
column3: na aber no mu
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse
column6: na worinnya bi; na Juda no bɔn so
column7: na wonnkohu: na medze befir hɔn a mebɛdan hɔn megya dɛ nkaasefo no."

column2: "Tu Merataim asaase no do sa
column3: ɔnoara no do a
column4: na Pekod atsefo no do: kuku na sɛɛ nkaasefo no korakora
column6: na yɛ dɛ mbrɛ mahyɛ wo nyinara."

column2: "Ɔko ne dede gyegye asaase no do
column3: na ɔsɛɛ kɛse so dze."

column2: "Mbrɛ woetwitwa na woebubu asaase nyina hamɛr no mu esinesin a! Mbrɛ Babilɔn edua adan amamfo wɔ amanaman mu a!"
"Babilɔn
column3: mesua wo efir na wɔapa wo so
column4: na ɔwoara ennhu: woehu wo

column2: "EWURADZE ebua n'akoradze dan na woeyi n'ebufuhyew akodze epue: osiandɛ EWURADZE
column3: dɔm EWURADZE no
column4: wɔ dwuma bi dzi wɔ Kaldeafo asaase do."

column2: "Hom mfir mfɛndzanan mbra no do
column3: hom mbuebue n'eburosan no: hom ntutu no ngu dɛ efiefi
column4: na hom nsɛɛ no huntuhuntu: mma hom mma no mu biribi nnka."

column2: "Hom nkuku n'anantwinyin nyina; hom mma wɔnsan nkɔ ekumii. Wondue! Osiandɛ hɔn da edu
column3: hɔn asotweber no a."

column2: "Hom ntsie hɔn a woguan na wofi nsa fi Babilɔn asaase do
column3: dɛ wɔrekɛpaa mu aka EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn n'awerdzi
column4: n'asɔrfi ho awerdzi akyerɛ no hɔn ndze."

column2: "Hom mfrɛ egyentofo no nyinara nkɔtoatoa Babilɔn
column3: hɔn a wɔkontom egyen no nyinara; hom mbɔ nseraban ntwa no ho nhyia; mma hom mma no mu obiara mmfi nsa: hom nsusu n'edwuma do nhyɛ no ananmu; dɛ mbrɛ ɔno ɔayɛ nyinara no
column4: hom so nyɛ no bi: osiandɛ ɔayɛ EWURADZE no do nkontompɔ

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na ne mberantsɛ bɔtotɔ n'abrɔn do
column3: na wɔbɛma ne mbarimba akofo nyinara wɔayɛ foo wɔ da no mu
column4: EWURADZE na ɔse."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔwo ɔkontompɔnyi
column4: menye wo enya
column6: dɔm Ewuradze no na ɔse: osiandɛ wo da no edu
column7: ber a medze bɔtwe w'aso no a."

column2: "Na ɔkontompɔnyi no befintsiw na ɔahwe ase
column3: na obiara remma no do: na mubokua gya wɔ no kurow no mu
column4: na ɔahyew dza abɔ no ho aprɔw nyinara."

column2: "Mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE se nye yi: wɔatseetsee Israelmba na Juda prɛko: na hɔn a wɔfaa hɔn ndɔmmum nyina dzedze hɔn mu dzen; wɔpow dɛ wɔbɛma wɔakɔ."
"Hɔn pomfo yɛ dzen; ne dzin dze dɔm EWURADZE: obedzi hɔn asɛm kofekofe ama hɔn
column3: na ɔama asaase no ahomgye
column4: na ɔahyɛ Babilɔnfo no ahomtsew."

column2: "Afona wɔ Kaldeafo do
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse
column4: na Babilɔnfo no do
column5: na n'asafohen na n'enyansafo no do."

column2: "Afona wɔ ahohyehyɛfo no do
column3: na wɔbɛyɛ akwasampafo! Afona wɔ hɔn mbarimba akatakyi no do
column4: na hɔn akoma botutu."

column2: "Afona wɔ hɔn mpɔnkɔ na hɔn ntseaseanam do
column3: na aforaforafo a wɔwɔ no mu no nyina do
column4: ama wɔaayɛ dɛ mbaa: afona wɔ n'akoradze do

column2: "Weseeyɛ wɔ n'esu do
column3: na wɔbɔwewew: osiandɛ ɔyɛ ehonyi a woesian asaase
column4: na wɔabobɔ adam wɔ abosom ho."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi sar do mbowa abɔyafo wɔnye mpataku bɛtsena wɔ hɔ
column3: na nsohor bɛtsena mu: na wɔrenntsena do bio dabiarada; eso wɔrenntsena do bio ofi ebusuasantsen kɛpem ebusuasantsen."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn butuuw Sodom na Gomora na hɔn ho nkurow no
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse; dɛmara so na nyimpa biara renntsena hɔ
column4: eso nyimpa biara rennyɛ ɔmamforanyi wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔman bi fi kwaamu afamu reba; na wobekenyan ɔman kɛse
column4: na ahemfo pii efi asaase ne mfɛndzanan noho."

column2: "Wokurakura egyen na peaa; hɔn tsir yɛ dzen
column3: na wonnyi ehumbɔbɔr; hɔn ndze wor dɛ po
column4: na wɔtsetse mpɔnkɔ do; obiara etwa mpasuar
column5: dɛ ɔbarimba a ɔrokɔ akono wɔ wo do

column2: "Babilɔnhen atse hɔn nka
column3: na n'abaw egura: nketsenketse akyer no
column4: na yaw a ɔtse dɛ ɔbaa a ɔwɔ awoko mu."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: ɔbɔfow dɛ gyata fi Jordan ne ntsɛn no mu abɛtsena bea a ɔyɛ dzen no do
column4: na mebɛma woeguan efi me nkyɛn awerɛfir mu; na obiara a wɔasan mu eyi no no
column5: ɔno na medze no besi no do: na woana na ɔtse dɛ emi? Woana na ɔbɛhyɛ me mber? Woana nye oguanhwɛfo no a obegyina m'enyim no?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom ntsie EWURADZE n'apam a ɔapam etsia Babilɔn no; na ne tsirmpɔw a ɔabɔ etsia Kaldeafo asaase no: Ampaara wobotwuw hɔn adze akɔ
column3: mekyerɛ nguankuw mu nkakraba no; ampaara ɔbɛma hɔn tsenabea ayɛ amamfo ama hɔn."

column2: "Babilɔn ne gye ne dede ntsi
column3: asaase wosow
column4: na wɔtse nkekamu no wɔ amanaman mu."
